retrial.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a process of judging a law case in court again
retrial.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The jury was dismissed and the judge ordered a retrial.
retrial.translation[1].definitions[0].de: the process of bringing a legal case back to court so that it can be decided again
retrial.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: His request for a retrial was dismissed.
